Creator: Alma C. Wilson
Siri Lawson, trans.
Text:
Honorable Gentlemen.  I would like to know from you if my husband John Holm presently has any money there in your bank, as well as how much in American dollars or calculations

Reply immediately please  air mail

Mrs. John Holm

108 West 5 St.

Dell Rapids

S.D.
Title: Alma C. Wilson to Hegre Sparebank 1948.3.16
Description: CARBON COPY OF A LETTER WRITTEN BY ALMA WILSON, ON BEHALF OF HER MOTHER, DATED MARCH 16 â€“ 1948, TO HEGRE SPARE BANK.
